question: For some reason I feel that i am dirty from the inside, I want to purify myself from the inside.
answer:
QUESTION
I know i really didnt do anything wrong but sometimes when you get caught up with very minor things that might be haram. Few months back i used to feel purified withing my soul but i dont know what happend now.. can u please advise me. where somewhere i can feel clean from the inside.i mean closer to Allah (SWT) Jazakallah Khairan
ANSWER


Share:
Alhamdulillah, the first step is acknowledged that you feel the need to purify yourself from within. Your journey of purification needs to start with five times of Salaat following this with Sunnah Azkaa after Salaat, e.g. the recitation of Tasbeeh Faatima, Aayatul Kursi, 3 times Astaghfirullah, also Laa Ilaaha illallaahu Wahdahu Laa Shareeka lahu. Lahul Mulk Walahul Hamd Yuhyee Wa Yumeet Wahuwa ?alaa kulli shay-in Qadeer 10 times.

You also need to earn the Halaal way and eat that which is Halaal. Give charity and strive in the path of Allah Ta?ala. Insha Allah, you would come closer to Allah, Aameen.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
